description: The ban will begin on Friday following the driest spring on the island for 35 years.
title: Hosepipe ban introduced on Isle of Man after record dry spring
title_page: Hosepipe ban introduced on Isle of Man after record dry spring - BBC News
maintext: Figures from the island's Met Office show rainfall of just 78.7mm between the start of March and the end of May, compared to a long-term average of 172mm.
